issue.title: [CF 712] In 5.1, all icons display as solid green
issue.body:
I'm not using custom textures or anything like that.  I've made no changes to my setup from yesterday (before the 5.1 patch) when everything worked.

After updating, none of the icons display anything but solid green.  I'm running through Wine in linux.  It shouldn't be an issue, but I thought I'd mention it.


> Posted by CurseForge user suppicurse | Imported from CurseForge issue #712 | Raw

comments.body:
Also, I thought I should mention this... I had been running 6.0.3, but I tried upgrading to 6.0.4 and r673 and both have the same issue.


> Posted by CurseForge user suppicurse

Also to clarify... This affects all icons. If I hold the right mouse button in setup mode, the icon displays while the right mouse button is held. It displays only solid green when not holding the right mouse button, or when not in setup mode.

Edited Nov 27, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user suppicurse
